item.description:
IGT - impromtu get together! I know a few other meetup members are going to this event tonite.

I've been to street markets in Hong Kong and Vancouver and thought this might be fun. The Hungry Tiger Street Festival brings a completely new experience, inspired by the Night Markets of the far east, to Somerville's Union Square. It will tickle, tease, and otherwise engage all of your senses!

For one night, Hungry Tiger will transform Union Square into a bustling night market featuring food and entertainment from the numerous continents and countries represented by the businesses of Union Square. Street foods familiar to those in Brazil or Thailand will be served to passer-byes, with live cooking and food demonstrations. Local artists will be peddling wares and costuming visitors on sight with original one-of-a-kind wares unlike any you have ever seen before. Finally, there will be performers captivating the crowd and blending into this magical, one-night-only environment that you, the visitor, are helping create.

Where to meetup - please call/txt my cell phone (617-755-2147). I'm not sure where to meet since this is the first time the festival is being held.

How to get there - T buses, no train stops to Union Square. If you drive, parking is always tough in somerville.

More info: http://www.thesomervillenews.com/archives/17698


The following is a still-growing list, stay tuned for updates!*

Activities:
Lantern panting, free face & body painting.

Vendors:
I am Joolien - http://www.etsy.com/sh...
Paper & Sky Lanterns - http://www.youtube.com...

Performers:
A constant lineup of fier spinners, hoopers, etc.

Restaurants:
Ronnarong - Thai
Pao Do Acucar - Brazilian
Ebi Sushi - Japanese
El Potro - Mexican
Neighborhood - Portuguese
Macchu Picchu - Peruvian
Precinct - American
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the beginning of the vendor area. Please call my cell phone.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hungry Tiger Street Festival
